info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 24 at 5:24PM MST until December 25 at 12:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Winds gusting as high as 85 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Glacier National Park and adjacent foothills and plains. * WHEN...Until Noon MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Very strong winds could cause extensive damage to trees and power lines. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...In addition, rain and snow may fall Saturday evening in the mountains. While air temperatures may be above freezing, rain may still freeze on contact with the frozen ground.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.
